list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a liquid) fall slowly in drops or a thin stream.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mưa rụt rát xuống cửa sổ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (chiefly in soccer, field hockey, and basketball) take (the ball) forward past opponents with slight touches of the feet or the stick, or (in basketball) by continuous bouncing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he attempted to dribble the ball from the goal area
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã cố gắng rê bóng quả bóng từ khu vực mục tiêu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thin stream of liquid; a trickle.
(in soccer, hockey, and basketball) an act or instance of taking the ball forward with repeated slight touches or bounces.
